t: Icon rebrands as iFIT Health & Fitness | @FitTechGlobal
s: March 27, 2025 - Fit Tech news: Fitness equipment supplier, Icon Health & Fitness, has rebranded and changed its corporate name to iFIT Health & Fitness.

t: ICON Health & Fitness Announces Name Change to iFIT Health & Fitness Inc.
